title: integrated graphic card working better than my nvidia
body:
how is this possible????i have 60 fps constantly with my integrated card..with nvidia..it spikes..early i have 150 fps..it drops down to 20 gps after, with huge spikes:|

can someone explain, how a video card that is supposed to be weaker, is outperforming the nvidia card

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=DatFatRaccoon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=K0EJz28T,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-09T03:39:16.355+0000)
>
> That sounds like a known issue we've encountered before with some high end hardware. I'd suggest giving the steps in [**this article here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626) a check. It involves making sure there's a cap on your frame rate and additionally turning off movement prediction; that options seems to interfere with FPS sometimes.
> 
> If those steps don't help, you can also try additional troubleshooting steps for FPS found through a link at the bottom of that article. Those should get you fixed up real quick, but if not keep in touch with me and I'll see what other solutions exist or direct you to help with Tech Support.
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

its not an high end PC..i have an old laptop:P..dual core i5. the problem is that, the game runs better, with constant fps with my intel graphics card..if i have my nvidia on..it's very laggy, i have no ideea why.

PS. i actually had to change the game, to make it use my integrated card:P (in task manager, when i was in a game, i found the program and change his default graphic card)i..and now, i have constant 60 fps (with no cap) and my video graphics are set to medium. When i used nvidia, i was on low, and playing on 20 fps..really strange:|.
